description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 地下水對人類而言扮演相當重要的角色（特別在飲用水方面），但隨著工商的發達，其來自人為或自然的威脅卻與日遽增，本課程除可讓學生瞭解地下水水及水力等基本原理外，亦著重污染等傳輸行為之解析，以為規劃及管理地下水資源之依據。
description.en: In as mush as ground water provides drinking water to so many people, the quality of ground water is very important. Ground water may be contaminated from natural sources or he acts of humans. The ground water hydraulic and transport are discussed. Then the ground water contamination can be controlled.

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

description.zh: 為應因八十七年之放流水標準,廢水處理必將進入高級處理之階段.在本課程中將深入探討混凝與膠凝,沈凝,氨氣提,過慮,吸附,薄膜處理,離子交換等各單元,並說明如何應用於廢水處理.
description.en: This topic is going to introduce Coagulation and Flocfulation,Sedimentation,Ammonia Removal,Filtration,Adsorption,and on exchange,and let learner know to use each unit on the wastewater treatment.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

name.en: The Software of Mechanical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）Matlab  and  toolkit 之使用
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid  design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Application of  Matlab and toolkit

name.en: The Software of Electrical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助電路設計自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）spice與pspice電腦輔助電路設計軟體之介紹及應用  （4）電路佈局自動化設計軟體之介紹及應用  （5）期末專題
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid circuit design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Introduction and application for computer-aid circuit design software(spice & pspice). 4. Introduction and application for design automatic software of circuit layout. 5. Final project.

description.zh: 1.自動化概念 2.個人電腦之介面 3.人機介面發展平台 4.視窗應用界（API）：動態連結程式庫（DLL）動態資料交換（DDE）及Active X基本程式設計 5.用戶端與伺服端系統架構 6.虛擬實境及多媒體的應用 7.簡介人工智慧專家系統模糊與類神經在人機界面的應用 8.圖形監控發展系統：輸出入DDE ， 網路DDE ， 監控網路 ，多感測系統。
description.en: main -machine Interface (MMI)1.Introduction to automation 2.Perosn computer Interface 3.Platform of main machine interface :Windows operation system. 4.Windows Application program Interface :DLL,DDE and active X program design.5. Client Server system 6.Multi-media and Virtual reality.7.Introduction to the application of AI, expert system, Fuzzy and neural network in MMI.8. Graphic Control user interface:I/DDE,NET DDE,monitor network and multi-sensory system.

description.zh: 1.動態系統之機械負載：加速度、摩擦、位移及外力負載  2. 動態系統之模型化處理 3. 動態模擬與分析 4. 電腦輔助動態模擬 5. 結論
description.en: 1. System dynamic mechanical loading effects, including inertia, friction, displacement and forcing effects. 2. Dynamic system modeling 3. Dynamic analyses and simulations. 4. CAD-simulations  5. Conclusions.

description.zh: 簡介，人工智慧語言介紹及工業應用，專家系統。
description.en: Introduction, Artificial Intelligence, programing language and its industrial application, expert system.

description.zh: 1.參數化設計之介紹及應用2.3D零件之建立及組立3.工程圖之製作4.零件設計之變更5.進階混成（Blend）特徵設計6.進階掃成（Sweep）特徵設計7.進階掃混成（Swept  Blend ）特徵設計8.進階曲面特徵設計9.進階零件組立10.進階工程圖製作
description.en: 1.Introduction and Applications of Parametric Design.2.Construction and Assembly of 3D Parts.3.Engineering Drawing Creation.4.Part Manipulation and Relations.5.Advanced Blend Feature Design.6.Advanced Sweep Feature Design.7.Advanced Swept Blend Feature Design.8.Advanced Surface Feature Design.9.Advanced Part Assembly.10.Advanced Engineering Drawing.

description.zh: 工業機器人概論，基礎理論分析：運動學，動力學，控制等，機器人之設計程序，機器人在彈性裝配與製造系統之應用分析與系統設計，智慧型機器人，個案研究等 。
description.en: Introduction to industrial robot, Fundamental theory of robot: kinematics, dynamics, and control etc., Robot design process, Application to flexible assembly and manufacturing system, Introduction to intelligent robot, Case study, etc.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括頻域的Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、數位濾波器設計、數位控制器設計、及狀態空間之數位控制器設計、電腦控制等。
description.en: This course includes Z-transformation, sampled data system, digital filter design, digital control design and implementation in frequency domain and also in state space, and computer control system.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.﹒

description.zh: 1. 電力系統品質項目與定義2. 電壓降與停電3. 電壓不平衡4. 電力諧波5. 頻率變動6. 電壓閃爍7. 暫態過壓8. 電力品質監控
description.en: 1. Terms and definitions of power systems quality2. Voltage sags and interruption3. Voltage unbalance4. Power harmonics5. Frequency deviation6. Voltage flicker7. Transient overvoltages8. Monitoring of power quality

name.zh: 計算機在電力系統之應用

description.zh: 1. 簡介2. 電力系統簡介3. MATLAB簡介4. 電力潮流分析5. 最佳化調度6. 電力系統故障之研究7. 電力系統穩定度分析
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Power system matrix3. Introduction to MATLAB4. Power flow studies5. optimal Dispatch6. Fault Studies7. Power system stability

description.zh: 這門課程主要是介紹資料庫系統的理論與應用，內容包含有： 1. 資料庫系統的介紹與架構 2. ER 資料模式 3. 檔案儲存結構 4. 關連式資料模式 5. SQL 查詢語言 6. ER資料模式與關連式資料模式之間的轉換 7. 資料庫正規化 8. 最佳化查詢 9. 交易處理
description.en: This course provides introduction to both database system theory and application. These are the following : o 1. Database System Concepts and Architecture -2. Data Modeling Using the Entity-Relationship Model --3. Record Storage and Primary File Organizations -4. -The Relational Data Model -5. SQL -6. ER- and ERR-to Relational Mapping -7. Functional Dependencies and Normalization for Relational Databases -8. Query Processing and Optimization -9. Transaction Processing Concepts

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的是介紹生物程序之必需知識給傳統化學工程，假定他們未具生物學的背。生物程序是應用工程原理，來設計，發展以及採用生物催化劑來解析程序。這些程序可得很多結果，諸如生產期望化合物或分解破壞不要的有害的物質。工程的工具，尤其化學工程將會成功拓展生物程序所必須。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the essential knowledges of bioprocessing to traditional chemical engineers. No background in biology is assumed. Biopocess engineering is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze process using biocatalysts. These processes may result in the production of desirable compounds or in the destruction of unwanted or hazardous substances. The touls of the engineer, particularly the chemical engineer will be essential to the successful exploitation of bioprocesses.

description.zh: 課程內容包高等控制策略，多變數控制系統，數位取樣，數位控制系統，模式識別，狀態變數。
description.en: An introduction to advanced control algorithms, multivariable process control, digital sampling, digital control system, model identifications, state variable.

description.zh: 機構、機械設計、古典動力學、熱力學第一定律及熱平衡、潤滑與摩擦、機械加工、機電系統匹配、機械負載等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Mechanism and Mechanical design, Classical Dynamics, Thermal Analysis, lubrication and wear, Mechatronic system design and practice.

description.zh: 電機機械、電力系統設計與匹配、電動機驅動與設計、光電原理等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Basic Electrical Engineering training for students with Mechanical Engineering major. The goal of this course is to get familiar with the building blocks of electrical systems in Mechatronic applications. Major topics include Electrical machines, Motor Drives, Power Amplifiers, Power Electronics, and OP-Amp related signal processing circuits. Lectures are given to illustrate the function of the each block in electrical systems. And then the students can conduct experiment to explore relevant circuits in order to obtain thorough understanding of their characteristics.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Management of High Rise Buildings

description.zh: 1.高層建物之實態與傾向2.高層建物之火災災例分析3.高層建物火災時避難安全問題4.避難安全設計5.高層建物之火災安全對策6.實例研討
description.en: 1.Situation & Development of High-rise Buildings2.Analysis for High-rise Building in Fire3.Evacuation Safety on High-rise Building Fires4.Designing for Evacuation Safety5.Strategies of Fire Protection for High-rise Buildings6.Case Study

name.zh: 土壤與結構物互制行為
name.en: Interactive Behavior between Soil and Structure

description.zh: 土壤與結構物之間的界面有應力的存在，該應力的大小與土壤及結構物的力學性質有關，也與結構物的變形有關.列如:地下室開控過程中，擋土結構物的變形，擋土牆的變位,基樁的變位等等。
description.en: The stress between soil and structure depends on the mechanical properties of soil and structure,and also influence the deformation of structure. Such as the excavation of basements and piles etc...

name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 介紹國內外"都市防災基本計畫"之沿革，內容；探討都市防災之規劃，設計；都市更新（災後重建）中防災的課題；防災生活圈與防災據點之設立原則。
description.en: Introduce the "Urban precaution basis plan"of Taiwan and other countries; Study the subjects regarding to city renewing or reduiding after the caution;discuss the principles to set up the living zones and preecaution bases for urban disaster prevention.

name.en: Applications of Computer Software for Engineering

description.zh: 土木工程涵蓋範圍廣泛，本課程主要著重於工程軟體之應用，務使學生熟悉1.結構設計各步驟之計算方式及其電腦程式之使用方法.2.教授學生自行準備輸入程式資料,並操件以求取結果.3.根據學生之電腦輸出結果或操作中之偵錯方法及結果正誤之研判方法。
本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於提供方法，用來分析任何型式的結構物受任意動荷重所產生的應力與變化。
description.en: The primary purpose of this course is to present methods for analyzing the stresses and deflections developed in any given type of structure whenit is subjected to an arbitary dynamic loading.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 1.結構物劣化形態，介紹.2.目視檢測與非破性檢測。3.現況評估與分析。4.維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 基礎工程監測及檢測評估
name.en: In-situ Testing and Monitoring in Foundation Engineering

description.zh: 基礎工程施工期間，由於破壞原有的平衡，經常造成土壤或結構物的沈陷，傾斜，龜裂及破壞等，本課程介紹如何藉由監測的量測值，來分析評估基礎工程的安全性，同時也可配合非破壞性檢測的方法，來評估結構或土壤的力學性質，再進而評估安全性。
本課程旨在探討各種類型之神經網路，如逆傳遞網路，機率神經網路、學習向量量化網路、反傳遞網路、自述應共振理論、霍普菲爾網路、雙向聯想記憶網路、自組織映射圖網路等，此外相關文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the several ANN paradigm, such as Backpropagation, probability ANN, Counter-propagation, self-organization map. Hopfield network, BAN etc. Besides, the relative literature and applications will also cover.

description.zh: 作業研究是用來處理將有限資源分配於許多競爭性活動的問題上之一種有用的技術，它已經變成眾多企業工業機構的一種標準工具。基於線性規劃的基本知識高等作為研究提供一些有及可靠的運等方法來所決非線性規劃問題及機率模式。一些與實際應用有關的課題諸如有貨理論、等程理論、可靠度及決策理論等將在本課程中以討論。
description.en: This course discusses linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, (non) integer programming, Markov chains (Markovian decision process), queuing theory, inventory models, forecasting models, decision analysis and simulation.

description.zh: 介紹資訊整合與交換的概念。藉由作業程序的改造及資訊技術與標準的運用，將業務上所必要的資訊電子化，標準化，以建立全球共通商業系統的無紙作業環境。
description.en: Introduce the idea of information integration and exchange for the commerical environment. Also, by applying the buisness procedure re-engineering and information technology to establish necessary standard for paperless commercial environment.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

description.zh: 行銷看待是設計工程─它的組合由集成資料、模式、分析和電腦模擬設計一個有效的行銷規劃。我們的教學焦點：l 定義及介紹行銷工程與網路行銷l 策略性行銷l 戰術性行銷l 結合傳統行銷概念和新的網路行銷包括討論、遞送和技術。
description.en: Marketing resembles design engineering ─it consists of putting together data, models, analysis, and computer simulations to design effective marketing plans. We focus on：l Define marketing engineering and internet marketing plans.l Strategic marketing.l Tactical marketing.l Includes discussion, tips and techniques for combining   traditional marketing concepts with new web market methods.

description.zh: 本課程提供生產系統與管理研究所碩士班有關數量方法的核心課程。它敘述各種觀念，計量方法及控制在各種不同產業的應用。本課程不需特別數學先修課程。
description.en: This course is intended primarily for use in the quantitative methods course as a core requirement in master's degree program of system engineering and management .It draws upon a broad and varied industrial base as a fame of reference for the application of concepts , analytical techniques ,and controls . This course does not require any previous college-level mathematical background.

description.zh: 線性空間分析，狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性，穩定性分析，狀態回授及估測，控制器設計及應用，觀測器設計及應用，非線性系統，時變系統，控制理論的應用
description.en: Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Control theory

description.zh: 流體動力與化學動力學，Rankine-Hugoniot 關係，擴散火燄與液滴燃燒，層流火燄，紊流火燄，引燃、焠熄、可燃極限，噴霧燃燒
description.en: Fluid Dynamics and Chemical Kinetics, Rankine-Hugoniot relations, Diffusion flames and Droplet Burning, Laminar Flames, Turbulent Flames, Ignition, Quenching and Flammability Limits, Spray Combustion.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制2. 區域型電力能管理策略3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 「現代真空技術」課程概述真空技術廣泛應用在高科技產業中，如半導體、平面顯示器、光電、薄膜、低溫冷凍、太陽能、材料冶金、生物科技等。近幾年來由於高科技產業的蓬勃發展，帶動了真空產業的起飛，使得真空技術的發展一日千里，本課程除了介紹基本真空技術原理之外，另外將介紹目前在高科技產業中所使用的各項真空系統及相關零組件。課程內容包含有真空技術基礎、真空幫浦、真空計、真空材料與元件、抽氣過程與幫浦大小之選擇、真空系統、真空測漏技術與真空技術之應用。
description.en: The vacuum technology and industry are growing fast in the past two decades because of the highly growing of the high-tech industries including semiconductor, flat panel displayer, optics-electrics, thin film, cryogenic, solar energy, material, and biotechnology. The course will introduce the basic vacuum technology and the newly vacuum equipment and related vacuum components widely used in modern high-tech industrials. The contents of the course are basic vacuum technology, vacuum pump, vacuum gauge, material and component, pumping system, leak detection, and applications of vacuum technology.

name.en: Analysis and modeling of air distribution

description.zh: 非黏性流場分析，氣流質量、動量與能量守恆統御方程式，熱浮力分析，氣流模型分析，紊流之理論基礎分析，紊流之解析方程式，數值分析方法簡介
description.en: Inviscid flow distribution, mass conservation, momentum conservation, energy conservation, analysis of buoyancy effects, flow modeling, turbulence basics, solutions to turbulence flows, introduction to numerical methods.

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

name.en: Fire Safety and Smoke Control Technology

description.zh: 先修課程︰流體力學、熱力學本課程主要針對建築物防火及排煙技術作深入探討，主要闡述︰1. 火災動力學2. 防火材料性質3. 排煙技術4. 防火排煙設備5. 防火材料及設備測試6. 建築物防火排煙設計
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of fire safety and smoke control technology for buildings.The course includes the following topics:1. The outline of the dynamics of a fire2. The property of fire safety materials3. The smoke dynamics and smoke control technology4. The facilities for fire safety and smoke control.5. Testing of materials and facilities for fire safety and smoke control.6. Design of a fire safety and smoke control system for a building.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 企業研究的本質、科學方法、研究之概念基礎、理論與研究、研究之概念基、礎、研究問題與假設、文獻參考與研究變數、操作性定義之建立、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、研究草案、調查研究法、問卷法、訪問研究法、歷史文憲法與觀察法、個案研究法、量表法、實驗法、資料之分析法、單變量分析與一般統計分析、多變量分系、資料的解釋、研究報告、企業研究與決策之應用。
description.en: The nature of business research、scientific method、conceptual foundations of research、theory and research、elements of research and research process、research problem and hypothesis、literature review and variable of research、constructing operational definitions、measurement、modeling theoretical structures、research design、 research proposal、survey research、questionnaires、interview technique、documentary historical method and observation、case study、scaling、experiment、data analysis、univariate analysis and general statistical analysis、multivariate analysis、the interpretation of data、research report、policy implication of business research

description.zh: 資訊管理是一門較新的管理學門，在電腦早期發展時期，只有專業電腦人員才會懂得如何操作電腦，但隨著資訊科技的進步，個人電腦的普及，一般非資訊人員也可以很容易操作與使用電腦。然而會用電腦不見的對企業有所幫助，思考資訊科技如何給企業帶來競爭優勢是資訊管理領域所考慮的重要議題。一般來說，資訊管理主要探討企業如何對資訊系統及資訊人員作最有效的管理，以其與企業目標結合，替企業增加競爭優勢。本課程即站在管理與策略的角度分析企業應如何對資訊資源（包括資料、資訊系統與資訊人員）做最有效的管理，上課方式將採用個案研討為主，以期學生能瞭解理論與實務的發展。
description.en: This course will discuss how the organizations gain their competitive advantage through Information Technology. It covers the following three major parts: Part 1:Information System Planning. Part 2: Information System Management in the Organization. Part 3: Strategic use of Information System Part 4:Electronic Commerce and strategic impact.

description.zh: 本課程包含ERP系統演進，全球運籌管理，ERP系統軟硬體結構，及企業管理智慧系統。
description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, global logistic strategy, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and enterprise management intelligence system.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列主題：網路商業環境和未來發展，網路行銷，網路公關，網路商店之經營，線上廣告及交易。
description.en: This course includes following topics: network commerce environment and future development, network marketing, network PR, network store management, on-line advertisement and business, and network business safty.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 教學評量範圍、目的、沿革與發展，評量策略、評量結果分析及應用。
description.en: Application of personal computer to processes of classroom measurement and testing; test writing, scoring and evaluation based on computer use.

description.zh: 學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派；學習領域的探索，學習效果影響變項的探索；學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢。
description.en: Course Description: This course provides an overview of contemporary learning theories and research methodology on learning. Topics include behavioral approaches to learning , cognitive approaches to learning , and other related learning theories, types of learning, variables that affect learning, and applications of learning theories.

name.zh: 人力資源管理專題研究
name.en: Special Topics in Human Resource Management

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前人力資源管理重要課題，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: Exploration of concepts, current issues, and implication underlying from major research in human resource management. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

name.zh: 職業分析與輔導實務研究
name.en: Practical Study of Occupation Analysis & Guidance

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對職業內容、從業人員條件、職業相關資料，與職業手冊編製與運用進行個案探討。
description.en: Exploration of the main research in occupation analysis & guidance. Topics include occupation contents, the requirement of enterprise worker, occupation relation occupation, and the application & compilation of occupational manual. Case study, discussion, reporting are required.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育行政領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, trends and research in educational administration. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生提出產學合作領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in enterprise cooperative program. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in enterprise cooperative program through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 研究開放與遠距教學系統組成要素的發展背景、現況與未來，並探討不同生涯階段的學習者運用開放與遠距教學系統的成功教學策略。
description.en: In-depth study of the components of open & distance instruction, including historical development, current status, and perspective of distance education. Exploration of successful learning strategies for the learners using open & distance instruction systems in different career stages.

description.zh: 探討教育研究方法，培養研究的基本能力,具備研究的正確觀念與態度,本課程將探索質與量的研究、研究設計、取樣與量測、並設計了許多討論,實作和報告的活動,以結合研究方法的知識探討與實作技能。
description.en: An introduction to the process and methods of educational research and to developing a plan or proposal for research in the field. Topics include qualitative and quantitative research traditions, structure of a research article, research problem literature review and the role of Theory.

description.zh: 教育評鑑範圍、目的、嚴格與發展，評鑑策略、評鑑結果分析及應用。
description.en: In depth study of objectives, scopes, development, strategies of educational evaluation, and the application & analysis of the result in evaluation.

description.zh: 教育行政理論的歷史背景、學校科層體制、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能研究，及其相關實務之研究。
description.en: Historical background of the theories of educational administration; theories of school soscial system; school departmental hierarchy; school atomsphere; school leadership;studies of school efficiency; as well as practice of educational administration.

name.en: Research in Theories of Technial-Vocational Education

description.zh: 剖析技職教育的理論基礎、本質與特性研究。能力本位、群集、建教合作、生涯教育、職業輔導等理念對技職教育的影響，並對我國技職教育發展及特有問題的背景、產生原因以及解決之道深入探討。
description.en: Examination of objectives, foundation, basic theories and distinction in technical-vocational education. Topics include competency analysis, cluster analysis, cooperative program, life education, and career counseling. In depth study of background, current issues, trends, and conclusion or implication underlying main research in technical-vocational education.

name.zh: 技職教育課程發展實務研究
name.en: Studies in Practice of Curriculum Development in Technical-V

description.zh: 探討課程發展理論並以職業分析、社會需求等因素為基礎，決定技職教育課程目標、課程內涵。並進行課程評鑑等實務研。
description.en: Tednds in methodology for desinging, and evaluating curriculum in technical-vocational education at  vocational high school and community college levels; as well as practice research.

description.zh: 探討我國技職教育發展的背景、組織及影響；西洋技職教育的發展沿革、歷程、關鍵人物及其影響之研究。
description.en: To study the historical development of Vocatinal-Technical Education(VTE) in major country; focusing on educational background. System and individuals  influencing VTE.

name.zh: 技職學校行政實務研究

description.zh: 技職學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能研究。
description.en: Introduction to the fields of technical-vocational school administration. Topics include historical development of technical-vocational educational administration, theories of technical vocational educational administration, theories of school social system, school departmental hierarchy, school atmosphere, school leadership, theories of decision-making and communication, studies of school efficiency.

description.zh: （一）瞭解、預測及控制組織內工成員的行為；（二）培養積極有效管理組織內工成員的行為之基本能力。課程內容以個体、團体與組織三層次為經，行為基礎、激勵理論、個体決策、團体行為、團体決策、溝通理論、領導、權力與政治、組織設計、組織文化、組織變革與發展等相關議題。課程實施方法為講解、討論、個案研究及專題討論。
description.en: Human behavior in work organizations; nature of organizations; models of organization; design work structuring; motivation and performance; group and inter-group behavior; influence processes and planned change. Discussion, case study, and selected topics research are required.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育理論領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, trends, theories, and research in educational theory. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對技職教育學制領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in technical- vocation education schooling system.

name.zh: 獨立研究--評鑑方案規劃

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育評鑑方案規劃領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in planning of evaluation project.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

notes: 同時段研二專題討論授課老師：黃清孝

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

description.zh: 本課程介紹複合材料的原理，包括複合材料的高分子化學、複合材料的加工方法、複合材料的力學分析與設計、以及複合材料在高科技上的應用。加工方法包括真空袋成型法、壓力釜成形法、樹脂移送成型、編織法、纏繞成形法、拉擠成型法、模壓法…等，本課程詳述這些加工方法的原理及應用，同時介紹力學分析及設計，應力和應變之關係，複材之彎曲、靜態和動態之強度、脫層、耐久性、及以力學觀點設計複合材料，最後討論複合材料如何應用於高科技及民生工業上。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the principle and potential application of composite materials. It includes polymer chemistry, design and analysis of composite, and processing methods. The composite processings include autoclaves,vacuum vags, resin transform molding, braiding, filament winding, pultrusions, sheet molding compound,…etc. The principles and application of the methods will be elucidated. The analysis and design, strain-stress relationships, extension and bending, static and dynamic strengths, and delamination, will also be discussed. Finally, the potential application of the composite in high-tech industries will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課程探討液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括從液晶之熱力學探討液晶形成之原理，低分子量液晶在顯示器(STN LCD, TFT LCD)之應用，液晶配向膜，液晶補償膜，彩色濾光片之原理及應用，鐵電式液晶在光電之用途。最後研究主鏈和側鏈型的液晶高分子，如層列型、膽固醇型，這些材料在高科技及非線性光學上之發展。
description.en: The course is to elucidate the physics and chemistry of liquid crystal material. It includes application of liquid crystal as display derivces, liquid crystal display compensator, color filter, STN LCD, TFT LCD, and ferroelectric liquid crystals. Finally the potential application of the liquid crystal in nonlinear optics and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

description.zh: 空間結構為一意義之表層結構（表達形式），深層結構為意義表達形式建構之運算規則，自素材中系統地抽取深義部份，統合成一意義深層結構：誘導式結構。此深層結構為一內化於主體之新經驗即情境，為利自身回饋與外在檢驗，深層結構不能外於主、客之交互文字論述建構。邏輯為回饋與外驗二者之有效推理與洞察之建構與檢驗工具，效力建立於置信概率上，因此誘導式結構之建構亦不能脫離於時空之相對合理外。
description.en: Space Structure is the Surface Structure of a represented meaning while H.S.is the Deep Structure and the Constructing Operator of the represented meaning. The Deep Structure was the unity of the significance abstracted from the materials systematically. The Deep Structure as an interiorized experience also called Situation, should not be seperated from the correlative construction of language expond, which will provide the opportunities for the outside inspection and the introspection. Logic is the fundation of the construction and the two-way inspections of the valid reasoning and insight. The validity is based on the credal probability, hence, the H.S.will be restricted in the boundary of Relative Time and Space.Situation as the operator of intuition, will combine the physical materials as a representational formation.

description.zh: 建築和都市的歷史, 理論, 和批評中的課題研究一.現代的 建築二.美國的 建築三.東方的四.建築師五.歷史保存六.技術的,構造的, 和程式性的主題討論。 七.本土建築
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of architecture and urban.A.Pre-ModernB.ModernC.AmericanD.OrientalE.ArchitectsF.Historic PreservationG.Technical, Structural, and ProgrammaticH.Urban DesignI.Vernacular Architecture

name.en: Landscape Design Method of Regional Approach

description.zh: 景觀，從比較完整的角度來看，既是人文的，也是自然的整體表現。現代化的普及知識和普同技術帶來對自然環境的衝擊和地區景觀特色的趨同，已經使得從事景觀設計專業警覺到應該反省當前景觀設計方法和表達的適當性。自從 1960年代以來被景觀建築專業奉為圭鎳的自然環境導向的設計方法已經開始遭到質疑。本課程從地域觀點講述有關的主張與理論；尤其以台灣地區為對象探討特定地區課題，以及依此理念所發展出的這一套設計理論與方法。此一課程的設計方法將可提供有興趣選擇環境設計方向論文的同學可能的觀念性架構。    1.  當代台灣景觀設計思潮與問題    2.  地域性環境規畫設計理論    3.  地域性景觀設計的內涵    4.  地域性景觀設計方法    5.  地域性景觀設計的實務
description.en: Landscape, from a more comprehensive viewpoint, involves with either natural environment or humanistic expression. The universal knowledge and technology brought about the significant impact to environment and the tendency of universal homogeneity. Looking for more regional reflected approach to landscape design has been a concern in searching for regionally sound landscape. Landscape practice in Taiwan is unexceptional to this phenomenon at all. To underscore the regional approach the course includes the issues below;    1.  Vision and fallacy of contemporary landscape design     2.  Rationale of the regional planning and design    3.  The body of regional design in landscape    4.  Method of regional approach to landscape design    5.  The practice of regional landscape design

description.zh: 本課程為建築史研究及寫作的入門課程，內容主要是介紹與歷史研究有關的各種理論與方法，及其運用於建築方面的狀況，目的為訓練研習者建立個人的歷史敘事觀，與從事建築歷史寫作的能力。課程含三大部份：  1.「歷史」意義概說。  2.歷史研究理論與方法研討。  3.建築史名作敘事架構分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the historical study and academic writing on architecture. The main body relates to theories and methods concerning with historical study and the possible application in architecture. It aims at the establishment of a analytical vision and the ability in academic writing in doing research of architectural history. Three parts are concluded:  1. Defining the meaning of 'History'.  2. Exploring the theories of historical studies and            research methodologies.  3. Analyzing the structure of remarkable articles on      'architecture history'.

description.zh: 近年國內營建環境有急遽的變化，政府及民間業者亦有諸多因應措施，如營建自動化、建築生產合理化、開放營建等議題陸續出現。但由於建築學界與業界的隔閡，設計與施工的各自侷限，相關的知識一直未能有效的貫穿，以致效益不彰。建築生產過程的一貫性與完整性考量將是本課程試圖探討的重點，因此將循序漸進的選擇適當的案例，逐步引導討論進入理論分析的層次。課程內容包括：    建築生產的歷史回顧    建築生產的流程與組織    建築生產決策的影響因子    建築生產的整體評估    建築生產的動向
description.en: Our building environment has changed tragically in this year. The government and enterprises do many efforts on issues like construction automation, rationalization of building production, and open building. But the segregation between schools and practices, self-limitation of design and construction, those related knowledge was never passed down effectively, that we still stocked in there.Deal with the whole and totality in the process of building production is our major concern. The course contentsl     A historical review     Process and organization    Factors of decision    A comprehensive evaluation     Future trend

description.zh: 本課程主要以歷史脈絡與觀點，鼓勵學生瞭解時空推移與聚落發展及計畫需求的差異，以加強其專業潛力及強化其能力以服務人群。課程內容主要包括：    一、 都市化的萌芽    二、 古典都市    三、 中世紀城鎮    四、 新古典城市    五、 工業革命    六、 都市對比    七、 生活條件提昇    八、 尋求好的都市    九、 重建都市與現代社會趨勢
description.en: The aim of this course is to encourage students to fulfill their professional potentials and expand their ability to serve the public by a historical context and perspectives. Its content including:  1. The dawn of urbanization  2. The classic city  3. The medieval city  4. The neoclassic city  5. The industrial revolution  6. The city of contrasts  7. Betterment of living conditions  8. Environmental improvement  9. Search for the good city  10. Rebuilding our city and modern social trends

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的工業設計研究方法的知識及技能架構，課程包括二大部份；第一部份探討工業設計研究計畫的準備及撰擬，第二部份除比較分析主要的工業設計研究方法外，也同時探討其中一種研究方法在工業設計專業領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. It focuses on conducting an industrial design research, collect, and report the data. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

description.zh: 本課程旨在(一)探討中西傳統家具造型起源及演化；(二)研究影響各時期家具風格形成的因素，包括社會文化環境、使用材料、結構方法、裝飾手法及其象徵意義等；(三)探尋傳統設計元素在現代家具上的可能應用。
description.en: An in-depth exposure to the origins of form and the evolution of furniture design both in Oriental and Western World; Comprehensive analysis of the characteristics, including specific cultural environment, material used, construction methods, ornamentation, and Symbolism in decoration which define a period style; Study the application of traditional design elements on contemporary furniture.

name.zh: 室內空間與家具設計研究
name.en: Study into Interior Space and Furniture Design

description.zh: 講授人、家具、環境之介面，進而探討室內空間機能、生活機能與家具之關係性。以家具為室內空間中之機能元素之一，探討家具設計之創新思維。
description.en: A general study of interface among man, furniture and environment that related to space function, living function and the use of furniture. Design philosophy of furniture, which is considered as a functional element in interior space, is to be deliberating in the study.

description.zh: 工業設計在產品開發上，係一多元素、多因素組合的系統性與整合性工作，其在企業內執行的成敗，關鍵在於：(1)企業組織體系是否能有效應用工業設計的功能，(2)設計部門是否能有效管理控制本身的設計品質，(3)設計行政事務工作(包括人事資料、材料及日程進度等)是否能有效率的管理與執行。因此本課程旨在研究探討設計專業上的高階之管理知識與技能，課程內容包含(1) 設計功能的管理、(2) 設計品質的管理、與(3) 設計行政的管理，課程並輔以實例專案研討驗證。
description.en: Industrial design is an integral activities with in product development. It's effect in organization depends on; 	1.The understanding and the applying of industrial design from    	  the TOP management organization.2.The management of design quality with in the design function. 	3.The efficiency and the effectiveness of design administration.Therefore, the content of this Special will including the theory and practice of 1.The management of design function.2.The management of design quality.3.The management of design administration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生有關「創新產品設計」之進階知識及實務應用技能，課程包含：產品趨勢推論、本土化產品創新特質及發展，課程並著重在跳躍式、漸進式及綜合式設計案例研究、專案企畫發展、評估與專案管理。
description.en: Principles and Practice of Product Innovation, Product Evolution, Nature of Indigenous Product Innovation and its Development, Case Studies in Radical and Incremental Design in Design Project Planning, Development, Evaluation and Management.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC及O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括PSI指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，此包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系
description.en: "Resource Recovery and Managemet" is a course to introduce the principle of 4R in waste management. Contents of the course consist of approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對水質化學之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括高等平衡化學、高等複合化學、高等氧化還原化學在於薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序之應用
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of water chemistry, water quality and water quality control.  The topic will include the applications of Chemical equilibrium, Redox reaction and coordination chemistry on water treatment processes such as CSF, membrane, GAC, Ion exchange and disinfection processes.

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎 2.影像的轉換 3.影像的加強 4.影像的復原 5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮 7.影像的分割與特徵抽取 8.影像的表達及描述 9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals 2.Image transforms. 3.Image enhancement 4. Image restoration 5. Color image processing. 6. Image compression. 7. Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and desciption 9. Recogmition and interpretation  10. Applications: ALV navigation and medical image.

description.zh: 本課程在討論陶瓷性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 1. 電壓型變頻器控制 2 電流型變頻器控制 3. 交流電機模式4. 雙向變頻器系統 5.變頻器系統模擬
description.en: 1 VOLTAGE SOURCE INVERTER CONTROL 2. CURRENT SOUR INVERTER CONTROL 3. MODELING OF AC DRIVES4. 5IDIRECTIONAL INVERTER SYSTEM 5. SIMULATION OF INVERTER SYSTEM

description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 微加工程序含MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 本課程授課主要內容分為三部分：第一部份為都市防災概論，此部分主要針對國內外文獻作一回顧，進而瞭解都市防災整體架構，區分為（1）文獻回顧；（2）防災基本計畫；及（3）防災整體架構等。期使國內都市計畫能逐步邁向防災都市計畫，以建立『安全都市』為目標。此部分的主要內容區分為：（1）都市災害風險理念的形成；（2）防災都市計畫與地區防災系統規劃；（3）都市計畫防災系統規劃原則；（4）都市計畫防災作業準則內容架構；（5）都市計畫防災作業準則；（6）安心都市計畫的形成與實現。第三部分為實務操作部分，以草屯鎮為例，藉九二一大地震的實例，深入探討災情調查的方法，實際調查狀況及研訂災後重建的程序與計畫內容，期望成為國內都市重建計畫的範例，主要內容區分為：（1）緒論；（2）重建理論；（3）草屯鎮現況發展；（4）災情調查方法與重建程序之建立；（5）災情調查分析與重建計畫內容研訂等。
description.en: The subject will be presented in three partsPart One - (1) Literature retrospection; (2) Fundamental planning for disaster prevention; (3) An integrated disaster prevention organization.Part Two -The major contents to be addressed include (1) Formation of urban disaster cataclysm and risk; (2) Urban disaster prevention plan and regional disaster protection system planning; (3) Principles for planning disaster prevention system in urban plan; (4) Operational standards and organization for urban disaster prevention; (5) Operational guidelines for urban disaster prevention; (6) Realization and formation of trouble free urban plan.Party Three -. The major contents are (1) Introduction; (2) rehabilitation theory; (3) Current development in Tsaotun City; (4) Establishment of damage survey method and rehabilitation procedures; (5) Detail analysis of damage survey report and preparation of rehabilitation plan content.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務-都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務-都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務-容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述土地使用管制機制、課題與對策，以為規劃人員或設計者如何以土地使用策略系統來管制實質環境影響及與建築的關係媒介。其內容包括： 一、前言：全球化與歷史性的觀點 二、都市化、聚落形態與中心 三、反都市化及地方自治化 四、都市形態與結構，聚落機能形態 五、聚落發展過程之理論與實務觀點 六、土地使用要素及土地使用者：關聯與衝突 七、住宅、工業、商業發展與交通運輸 八、現代都市改變的壓力與永續發展
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about land use control how a planner/designer uses land-use equipment system to control physical environmental impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium. This course includes: 1. Global and historical context. 2. Urbanization; settlement patterns and centers 3. Counterurbanization and decentralization 4. Urban form and structure; settlement morphology 5. Settlement development process: factors and theoretical perspectives 6. Components and landusers: linkages and conflicts 7. Residential, industrial, commercial development and transportation 8. Contemporary pressures for urban change; sustainability

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在研究目前環境議題與強化有關環境規劃設計的理論與經驗，以及增進對環境整體規劃與設計可能途徑的瞭解。故本課程主要內容包括：一、緒論 二、環境決策 三、環境保護政策 四、永續發展 五、達到良好環境規劃與設計的可能途徑 六、環境規劃與設計的專業實務練習 七、結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the nature of current environmental issues, and further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with the various approaches to environmental planning and design. Our hope is to improve planning and design practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1.Introduction 2.Environmental decision-making 3.Environmental protection policy 4.Sustainable development 5.Alternative approaches to environmental planning and design. 6.Professional practice of environmental planning and design 7.Conclusions

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

description.en: To provide an overview of Vehicle Dynamics and Control Systems of intelligent vehicles in ITS.  Students will learn introduction to vehicle dynamics, driver modeling, driving simulation, engine/power-train control, cruise control, traction control/ABS, four-wheel steering, steer-by-wire, active/semi-active suspension, intelligent traffic systems, active safety technologies, and advanced power-train technologies.  Upon completion of this course, students should be able to follow the literature on these subjects and perform independent design, research and development work in this field.

description.zh: 由於經濟活動的急遽擴張，大量生產、大量消費的生活型態，產生大量廢棄物，導致環境負擔超過涵容及復原能力，加上台灣地狹人稠，自然資源不豐，造成環境品質惡化及發展遲滯危機，因此，如何突破天然資源限制，開創永續發展動能，以建設舒適美好生活環境，實為當前重要課題。本課程分別從污染防治、生化程序控制、材料製程應用及災害防治等工程技術觀點著手，培養具永續發展之經營管理智能。
description.en: Because of fast economic development of the modern society, our environment has been deteriorated due to the massive waste production from these economic activities.  Therefore, how to recover and provide the best environment from engineering point of view is a very critical issue.  This course will provide specific knowledge base to these advanced students from pollution control, chemical process, disaster prevention and material engineering points of view in order to minimize waste production before, during and after the production process.

description.zh: 本課程著重食品冷凍之原理、設備、儲存及應用技術，使學生深入了解食品冷凍之精髓。課程涵蓋︰（1） 食品儲存方式與設備。（2） 食品微生物理論（3） 各種食品之冷凍方式與原理（4） 工業食品冷凍系統（5） 食品冷凍運輸之方法和技術（6） 超低溫食品冷凍技術
description.en: This course is concentrated in the fundamentals facility storage and application technology of food refrigeration.  The students should be familiar with the principles of food refrigeration after these lectures.     The topics of this course are:(1) Food storage and equipment.(2) Food microbiology and refrigeration.(3) Refrigerating technology of various food products.(4) Industrial food freezing systems.(5) Distribution technology of chilled and frozen food.(6) Cryogenics in food refrigeration.

description.zh: 從闡述各種汽車共生系統在特定的工業製程，商業智慧型大樓或大學校園區域網路型式等能源有效利用的整合規劃設計，主要課程內容為： 1.汽車共生系統概念 2.熱力循環的技術理論 3.多元化的原動機利用 4.複合循環發電廠 5.都會型汽電共生利用 6.汽電共生的能源管理 7.汽電共生的環境管理 8.各種熱電轉換裝置 9.高級能源轉換科技之汽電共生
description.en: By studying this course, the following terms can be identified, defined, used: 1.The Concept of Cogeneration system 2.Theory of Cogeneration Technology. 3.Combined cycles plant. 4.Heating and cooling integration with power generation. 5.The Design Concept and Demonstrated economic performance of cogen. sys. 6.Social and Environmental management of cogen. sys. 7.Conversion Method and Technology on advanced system.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

description.zh: 互動設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。

Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 其主要是建立系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、儀器設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems. The contents include introduction of service industry, service design, service systems planning, site selection, layout, service process design, service automation, service process management, facility management, inventory control, queuing, performance management.

name.zh: 高等知識管理與專題研究

description.zh: 本課程以理論及個案為出發點，分析知識管理的基本概念知識管理在實務上的應用，知識管理在策略上的重要性，以及企業如何進行知識管理。課程主題包括，組織學習，組織創新，市場導向理論，知識管理概論，知識創造與轉移，知識管理個案，知識管理與資訊技術。
description.en: This course will use case study to analysis how knowledge management impacts on the competitive advantage and its method of implementation. It will include the followings: organizational learning, innovation, market-orientation, knowledge creation, knowledge transferring, knowledge diffusion, and information technology impact on knowledge management.

description.zh: 本課程主要的目的是探討企業如何有效評估經營環境與競爭的本質並建立獨特而持續性的優勢，以啟動企業長期成長及獲利的引擎，利於不敗之地。
description.en: The objective of this class is to study the enterprises；business environment and the contents of computation effectively. To build up the unique advantage and pump the long-term groan profitable engine of the business is the main goal in this topic.

description.zh: 本課程介紹機器人技術，程式，與應用各類基礎。其中包括機器人動作分析與控制、機器人程式語言、機器人運動學、夾爪與末端效應器之運用。 根據各階段實際操作 RV-M2 、CSIRB-2000 、以及 X-YETITE 各型機器人。 實驗包括機器人重現性、動作與路徑、順應性、棧板堆疊等。
description.en: This is an introduction course of Industrial Robot. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of robot technology, programming; and applications, 2. robot motion ,analysis and control 3. robot end effectors 4. robot cell design and control 5. assembly and inspection safety, training ,maintenance, and quality.

description.en: A general study of function of space that affects quality of life and work. The elements that construct space are to be studied to form a general understanding of their physical and psychological influences to people who live in.

name.zh: 技職教育理論與實務研究

description.zh: 剖析技職教育的基礎、本質與特性。能力本位、群集、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導等理念對技職教育的影響。並對我國技職教育發展及特有問題的背景、產生原因以及解決之道深入探討。
description.en: Objectives and foundations of technical-vocational education; structural foundations of vocational education; organization of technical-vocational education; the future of technical-vocational education.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

name.zh: 技職教育課程發展研究

description.zh: 探討課程發展理論並以職業分析、社會需求等因素為基 礎，決定技職教育課程目標、課程內涵。並進行課程評 鑑。
description.en: Trends in methodology for designing, and evaluating curriculum in technical-vocational education at vocational high school and community college levels.

name.zh: 實習工場管理與安全研究

description.zh: 深入探討技職學校實習工場如何進行、規劃、布置、管理場房、設備物料及工場人事等事項以達到教學研究及安全法規之需求。
description.en: To probe intr the peration, the planning, the setting,workshop-management, equipment, the personnel assignment,etc.of the school shop in a vocatinal school, in order to meet the need of both teaching, research and safety regulations.

description.zh: 教學評量範圍、目的、沿革與發展，評量策略、評量結果分析及應用。
description.en: Application of personal computer to processes of classroom measurement and testing; test writing, scoring and evaluation based on computer use.

description.zh: 學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派；學習領域的探索，學習效果影響變項的探索；學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢。
description.en: Course Description: This course provides an overview of contemporary learning theories and research methodology on learning. Topics include behavioral approaches to learning , cognitive approaches to learning , and other related learning theories, types of learning, variables that affect learning, and applications of learning theories.

description.zh: 教育行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能研究。
description.en: Historical background of the theories of educational administration; theories of school social system ; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency.

description.zh: （一）瞭解、預測及控制組織內工成員的行為；（二）培養積極有效管理組織內工成員的行為之基本能力。課程內容以個体、團体與組織三層次為經，行為基礎、激勵理論、個体決策、團体行為、團体決策、溝通理論、領導、權力與政治、組織設計、組織文化、組織變革與發展等相觀議題。課程實施方法為講解、討論、個案研究及專題討論。
description.en: Human behavior in work organizations; nature of organizations; models of organization; design work structuring; motivation and performance; group and intergroup behavior; influence processes and planned change.

name.zh: 人力資源管理專題研究
name.en: Special Topics in Human Resource Management

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前人力資源管理重要課題，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: Exploration of concepts, current issues, and implication underlying from major research in human resource management. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前技職教育與訓練或人力資源領域進行能力分析，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。

name.zh: 職業分析與輔導實務研究

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對職業內容、從業人員條件、職業相關資料，與職業手冊編製與運用進行個案探討。
description.en: Exploration of the main research in occupation analysis & guidance. Topics include occupation contents, the requirement of enterprise worker, occupation relation occupation, and the application & compilation of occupational manual. Case study, discussion, reporting are required.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含SPSS、ERIC及其他相關軟體。

Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Planning and Risk Management

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目的，在使學生對污水系統有整體之設計概念，使其未來在實務工作時，了解如何著手進行設計一具水準、經濟、高效益之污水下水道系統。課程內容包括：1.污水下水道系統規則  2.管線系統設計 3.抽水設施設計 4.污水處理方法之選擇 5.污水處理設施(除油、攔污、沈砂)設計 6.初沈池設計 7.各種生物處理法設計 8.終沈池、浮除設計 9.三級處理設計 10.污泥濃縮設計 11.污泥消化設計 12.污泥脫水、焚化設計 13.污水處理廠配置設計 14.污水處理廠水力計算 15.污水處理機械設備及儀控系統選擇 16.污水處理廠機械動力設計 17.污水處理廠附屬設備設計
description.en: This course provides a general designing concept of wastewater treatment system, and makes student to understand how to make a design of wastewater treatment system, which combine quality, economizatin and high efficiency. The contents of the course include:rules of sewerage system, design of pipe system, design of pumping ststem, design of the facilities of sewage treatment, unit operation and unit process design of biological unit system, and design of advanced sewage treatment.

description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

Topics covered by this course are: (1) Scope and Purpose of Management Consulting, (2) Duties and Roles of A Consultant, (3) Consulting Process (4) Writing a Proposal and Drafting A Contract, (5) Interview and Presentation Skills, and (6) Development of a Manual and Report Writing. A group project is required to demonstrate student's understanding of the consulting and communication skills learned in this course.

description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 環境政策與國際環保事務

description.zh: 環境保護近年來備受全球重視，國際環保公約如保護地球臭氧層的蒙特婁議定書及保護瀕臨絕種野生物種的華盛頓公約，都備有貿易條款，對不遵守規範國家，得施以相關貿易制裁；世界貿易組織（WTO）中設置貿易與環保委員會，以協調貿易與環保間之問題與紛爭。因此本課程之目的在於加強學生對我國環境問題、政策及環保國際公約之深入了解，以作為進一步培養對環境規劃及管理之能力。
description.en: The environmental treaties such as Montreal protocol or Basel Convention require all the parties in the world to take appropriate measures to protect human health and the environment against adverse effects.  Therefore, the purpose of this class is to provide the comprehensive information on those international treaties and the resulting efforts and policies in Taiwan

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

description.zh: 本課程包括下列主題:網路商業環境和未來發展, 網路行銷,網路公關,網路商店之經營, 及線上廣告交易。
description.en: This course includes following topics: network commerce environment and future development, network marketing, network PR, network store management, on-line advertisement and business, and network business safety.

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛生產與行銷較一般商品所涵蓋的範疇複雜，如車輛製造管理、新車市場行銷、中古車通路、售後服務到融資與保險等的關連性，使之瞭解其間的重要性，並使其對未來車輛產業的職場認識有助益外，又可增添其在就業市場上的競爭機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the vehicle production and marketing in the part of production preparation, mass production control, new car marketing, used car marketing, after service, insurance, etc. The purpose of this course is to increase students' knowledge of vehicle industry and enhance students' competitive advantage.

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛製造課程包含車輛製造現場管理和車輛製造技術流程兩大部分，使學生了解整個汽車製造產業上的設備管理、量產管理和品質管理，以及汽車製造上所需的各種工藝技術，以觸發學生對汽車製造領域的興趣，進而擴大未來在汽車產業的服務機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the spot management and technical operation of vehicle manufacture. Students will understand the fields in facilities management, output management and quality control from this course. Furthermore, the aim of this course is to increase the students' interest and opportunity in the region of vehicle manufacture.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。產業發展與競爭，產業發展與環境，科技、市場及創新，產業生命週期，關鍵成功要素、創新需求與企業核心能力，創新環境及政策，創新與專利。
description.en: Industrial development and Industrial competition, Industrial development and environment protection, Technology, Market and Innovation Requirement Cycle, Innovation, Innovation Requirement & Know-how, Innovation and patent

description.zh: 類比系統、數位系統設計、數位控制及微處理機、介面程式設計、程式語言及軟體等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Analogy systems, Digital systems designed, Digital control and microprocessors, Interface programming design, Computer programming, software and Lab.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機電整合系統架構，機電整合系統之機構、感測器、驅動器與致動器、介面技術、可程式控制器應用，機電整合個案分析。
description.en: Structure of mechatronic systems, mechanism of mechatronic systems, sensors, drivers and actuators, interface techniques , application of  PLC and case study.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程在透過研討，讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 1.寬頻通訊系統簡介2.寬頻通道特性3.系統分析基礎4.UTRA實體層設計5.UTRA傳輸系統6.無線電資源管理7.CDMA20008.OFDM
description.en: 1.Introduction to Wideband Communication Systems2.Wideband Channel Characterization3.System Analysis Fundamentals4.The UTRA Physical Layer Design5.The UTRA Transmission System6.Radio Resource Management7.CDMA20008.OFDM

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3)基礎迴授控制器設計 (4)前饋控制器設計 (5)估測器設計(6)多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構, 鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係, 是一門實務性,基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性, 塑性行為, 差排理論, 單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形, 複合材料, 高溫聚晶材料之變形, 非晶質材料之永久變形, 材料強化機構, 材料破壞, 潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。製造系統之基本概念與架構，先進製造技術/系統（如CNC、機器人、群組技術、製程規畫、FMS、CIM等）之探討。製造（裝配）系統之設計與評估模擬，個案研究。
description.en: Basic concept and components of manufacturing system. Study of advanced manufacturing technology/system including CNC, Robotics, Group technology, Process Planing, FMS, CIM ,etc. Design and evaluation of a manufacturing system with special emphasis on assembly tasks.

description.zh: 建議先修課程：流體力學、水文學、統計學資料研析方法、水文統計與迴歸分析、小流域洪水推估(含基本水文系統實驗)、基本水文系統實驗、頻率分析(2)、水文演算、水力演算、降雨逕流模擬、地理資訊系統(GIS)結合地文單位歷線(GIUH)、序率水文模式，HEC-2,6 講解與實習、專題討論
description.en: Prerequisite(suggested) : Fluid mechanics, Hydrology, StatisticsIntroduction, Data error analyses, Hydrological statistics, Frequency analyses, Stochastic analyses, Hydrological routing, Hydraulic routing, GIUH plus GIS, Small watershed flood prediction(including Lab. experiment), Seminar.

description.zh: 介紹渠流基本原理及運算，配合水利工程實務，使學者了解基本渠力理論、渠變基本概念及設計簡易水工結構物。建議先修課程：流體力學水文學1.渠流通論 2.渠流及其特性 3.能量及動量原理及應用 4.等速渠流公式與計算 5.等速渠流斷面之設計 6.定量緩變流之理論分析與計算 7.實際渠流問題(ex:倒虹吸，量水設備)8.空間緩變渠流 9.水躍與消能池設計 10.變量渠流 11.洪水演算
description.en: Prerequisite(suggested):Fluid Mechanics.Hydrology,Statistics Introduction,Energy-Depth Relationships,Uniform flow, Gradually-Varied Flow Computations,Hydraulic Jump,Rapidly-Varied Flows,Spatially-Varied Flows, Supercritical flow,Unsteady flow, Semimar.

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Fourier Series 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling 2.Frequcy response of discrete time system 3.IIR digital filter design 4.FIR digital filter design 5.Discrete Fourier transform 6.Fast Fourier transform

name.zh: 有限元素法在大地工程之應用
name.en: Finite Element Method in Geotechnical Engineering

description.zh: 有限元素法常被用來模擬基礎施工、開控支撐及山坡地開控的過程，預估土壤或岩盤的變形行為，研判或分析施工的安全性。本課程的內容除了講授有限元素法的基本理論，尚須以大地工程的案例作為實際推導公式理論之演練。其案例包括滲流問題、壓密沉陷問題及土石結構穩定分析等等。
description.en: Finite element method ha been widely used to simulae the process of foundation construction, cut and bracing and excavation etc, and to predict and analyze the construction safety. This course should include the basic theory and sfiffues matrix formulation, in addition, geotechnical engineering problem are in addition, geotechical engineering problems are used to help students to understand the basic theory and code formulation. These examle problems includes seepage, consolidation and earth structure stability analyses.

description.zh: 寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為.
description.en: introduction to gem identification
